data.persona: My pack is behind me. I am alpha. Now is the wolftime.
data.description:
You are in the Cave.
This cave is situated along a mountainous trail. It is dark and damp. A cold air rushes through the walls of the cave.
There's a Wall, an a bear, a tree, and an art here.
The bird is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit the bird so that I can eat it.
data.mid_motivation: I am hunting with my pack for something to eat.
data.long_motivation: I need to make sure that my pack is well-fed and strong as we protect our territory from other packs and hunters.
